item.title: Get a Behind-the-Scenes Look at Seventeen’s Mingyu in New Calvin Klein Campaign (Exclusive Video)
item.description: The 28-year-old K-pop star has frequently collaborated with the brand in the past, including the Fall 2024 denim campaign.

item.title: K-pop Stars Seventeen Announce U.S. Leg of New World Tour
item.description: The 13-member supergroup will embark on the New_ world tour, kicking off the U.S. leg in Tacoma, Washington, this fall.
